name: Converging Destinies

name: Lufel's "Business" Plan
descriptionStr: Daily Phantom Thief training starts now! Do your best to complete goals. You can obtain Phantom Thief rewards when you complete all the goals.

name: TAKE YOUR HEART
descriptionStr: Persona 5 Special Event. Reunite in the Metaverse.

name: Trials of the Deep
descriptionStr:
Take on the Velvet Trials in the Velvet Room to clear challenges with your cognitive comrades!
Clear challenges and meet new members to help you.

name: Enhancement Rush
descriptionStr: During the event, gain more Konpaku Gems from certain quests in Realm of Repression: Training Materials.

name: Awakening Avenue
descriptionStr: During the event, gain more rewards from certain quests in Realm of Repression: Training Materials.

name: Shadow Hunt

name: Astounding Revelations
descriptionStr: During the event, gain more rewards from Realm of Repression: Revelations Set.

name: Wage Up
descriptionStr: During the event, earn double the amount of money when you work part-time through City Life

name: Robotic Challenge
descriptionStr: Robotic Challenge is a live broadcast program in the Metaverse. Challengers must solve the stage puzzles within a certain number of actions. Win the show by clearing stages.

name: Send 'Em Flying
descriptionStr: The waves in the Metaverse have gotten intense lately. Eliminate Shadows with Lufel and find hidden treasures in the depths below.

name: Crossroads of Fate
descriptionStr: When the Phantom Thieves activate the Metaverse Navigator to infiltrate the second Palace, they find themselves back at that strange Palace from before. There, they encounter new members from the other group of Phantom Thieves...

name: Crossroads of Fate: Pyramid Arc
descriptionStr: The broken Metaverse Navigator sends the Phantom Thieves into a desert, where they not only find a pyramid, but also a Phantom Thief girl who had lost her teammates. This time, they may have a chance to uncover the truth about the chaos taking place in the Metaverse...

name: Crossroads of Fate: Spaceport Arc
descriptionStr: After obtaining the Core, everyone was teleported to a new Palace. The mechanical-style architecture filled Oracle and the others with a sense of familiarity...

name: Unconditional Love Phase 1
descriptionStr: Educational reform is coming to the school. But as a Disciplinary Committee member, Riko realizes what this really means and gathers the Phantom Thieves in Kichijoji. There, a plan to overthrow the despots is quietly hatched...

name: Unconditional Love Phase 2

name: Sweet Yet Sour

name: Sweet Yet Sour
descriptionStr: Seeing the weakened Ms. Katayama, Riko awakens and finally opens her heart. Under Riko's instructions, the Phantom Thieves must think of ways to win back the teacher's love from Akashi.

name: Unconditional Love Phase 3
descriptionStr: Without its power source, Akashi's Shadow closes the Palace. To steal the Treasure, the Phantom Thieves must mislead Akashi's cognition. As their chief strategist, Riko proposes a bold and unconventional plan...

name: Summer Party Part 1
descriptionStr: The beach, swimsuits, running around under a clear blue sky... The anticipation for these seaside shenanigans is dashed by a disappointing scene of a deserted beach. To restore their summer fun, the Phantom Thieves make a dazzling appearance!
